description: System-generated unique identifier for this record; serves as the primary key.
Business code for the customization/module used to reference it across systems; likely unique; confirm with SME.
Human-readable name or brief summary of the customization/module.
Major version number indicating significant or breaking changes.
Minor version number indicating backward-compatible enhancements.
Build number for this release, often reflecting compile or packaging iteration.
Patch or revision number indicating small fixes after the build.
Date the customization was released or deployed to customers or production; confirm exact milestone with SME.
Identifier of the user or process that created the record (audit).
Date and time when the record was created (audit).
Identifier of the user or process that last modified the record (audit).
Date and time when the record was last modified (audit).
